<font size = "4">

I am a PhD candidate at Imperial College Business School, where I am fortunate to be advised by Professor [Wolfram Wiesemann](http://wp.doc.ic.ac.uk/wwiesema/){target="_blank"} and Professor [Heikki Peura](https://www.peura.org/){target="_blank"}.</br>

My research lies at data-driven optimization and statistical learning, with applications in revenue management and operations for non-profit organizations. </br>


<p style="text-align: center; font-size: 24px;">**I am on the job market of 2024-2025**</p>
